'''IndiraÂ Varma'''Â (born 14 May, 1973) is an English actress who portrays the role ofÂ [[Ellaria Sand]]Â in the [[Season 4|fourth season]].

Varma is the only child of a Hindu Indian father and a Swiss mother who was part Genoese Italian. She was a member of Musical Youth Theatre Company. She graduated from the Royal Academy of Dramatic Art (RADA) in London in 1995.

She is best known for her role as [[wikipedia:Niobe of the Voreni|Niobe of the Voreni]] in [[HBO]]'s ''[[wikipedia:Rome|Rome]]'', which also starred ''[[Game of Thrones (TV series)|Game of Thrones]]'' cast members [[Ciaran Hinds]] and [[Tobias Menzies]]. She is also known for her roles in the films ''[[wikipedia:Kama Sutra: A Tale of Love|Kama Sutra: A Tale of Love]]'', ''[[wikipedia:Bride and Prejudice|Bride and Prejudice]]'' and ''[[wikipedia:Basic Instinct 2|Basic Instinct 2]]'' and the TV series ''[[wikipedia:Luther|Luther]]'' and ''[[wikipedia:Human Target|Human Target]]''.
